app.title: 🌈 SkyPilot — Unofficial OpenAI Sora Dashboard
app.tagline: Mission control for your Sora creations 💜
app.disclaimer: This project is not affiliated with or endorsed by OpenAI.
app.instructions: ✨ Controls: arrows/j-k navigate • c create • x remix • enter download • d delete (y/n) • a cycle asset • e export CSV • r refresh • l language • q quit
app.costUnavailable: 🧮 Estimated cost unavailable for this configuration.
app.noVideos: No videos yet. Press c to launch your first scene ✨
app.thumbnailPreviewUnsupported: Inline thumbnail preview is not supported in this terminal.

activity.deleteNotConfirmed: 🤔 API did not confirm deletion of {id}.
activity.deleteConfirm: 🗑️ Delete {id}? Press y to confirm or n to cancel.
activity.remixNoTarget: 🎬 Select a completed video to remix.

cli.programDescription: SkyPilot (unofficial) CLI and Ink TUI for OpenAI's Sora 2 video workflows

create.description: Create a new video generation job

download.description: Download generated assets (video, thumbnail, spritesheet, or all)

delete.description: Delete a video job from OpenAI storage

remix.description: Create a remix of an existing video

currency.description: Get or set the preferred currency for cost estimates (ISO 4217 code)
currency.argument: Currency code, e.g. USD, EUR, JPY

language.description: Get or set the interface language

option.order: Order of results: asc or desc (default desc)
option.json: Output JSON instead of formatted text
option.prompt: Prompt text to generate the video
option.inputReference: Optional reference image to steer generation
option.watch: Poll the API until the job completes
option.download: Download the selected asset when generation completes
option.downloadAsset: Asset to download when generation completes
option.remixPrompt: Prompt text to use for the remix
option.jsonRemix: Return the raw JSON payload from the remix request
option.currencyCode: Currency code, e.g. USD, EUR, JPY
option.jsonCreate: Return the raw JSON payload from the create request

message.costUnavailable: Cost: pricing information unavailable for this model/size combination.
message.currencyCodeInvalid: Currency code must be a three-letter ISO 4217 code.
message.currencyFallback: Currency {requested} is not fully supported; falling back to {actual}.
message.deleteNotConfirmed: The API did not confirm deletion of {id}.
message.resolutionUnsupported: Resolution {size} is not available for model {model}. Available: {resolutions}
message.apiKeyMissing: OPENAI_API_KEY is not set. SkyPilot needs it to talk to OpenAI.
message.openingApiKeys: Opening the official OpenAI API key page in your browser…
message.openBrowserFailed: Could not open the browser automatically. Visit {url} (reason: {message}).
message.updateAvailable: 🚀 SkyPilot update available ({packageName}): {currentVersion} → {latestVersion}. Run {updateCommand} to upgrade.
